arts.ttl: Fiorentina coach Stefano Pioli at risk following loss to Lecce; Inter beats Verona
arts.sum: Earlier, Inter Milan moved within one point of Serie A leader Napoli with a 2-1 win at Hellas Verona that was decided with a stoppage-time own goal. Pioli led AC Milan to the Serie A title in 2022 then coached Cristiano Ronaldo at Al Nassr in Saudi Arabia before joining Fiorentina.

arts.ttl: Hellas Verona 1-2 Inter Milan: Telelombardia Director Defends Bisseck Call: “Anyone Who Says Red Does Not Know The Rules”
arts.sum: Fabio Ravezzani, director of Telelombardia, has leapt to the defence of referee Daniele Doveri and Inter defender Yann Bisseck after Sunday’s controversial moment in the 2-1 win over Verona. Bisseck was shown a yellow card for a foul on Giovane in the second half, a decision that caused heated debate on social media. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Coach Confirms France Star Is “Ready To Return” & Praises “Dirty” Win At Hellas Verona
arts.sum: After Inter Milan won 2-1 away to Hellas Verona, head coach Cristian Chivu reflected on a hard-fought afternoon that demanded as much character as quality and confirmed Marcus Thuram is ready to return to the team. The Romanian praised his side’s reaction and revealed why he opted for pragmatism over perfection at the Bentegodi. “The […] The post Inter Milan Coach Confirms France Star Is “Ready To Return” & Praises “Dirty” Win At Hellas Verona appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Verona 1-2 Inter Milan – Ex Referee Backs Decision To Give ‘Yellow Card For Bisseck, Ball Wasn’t Heading Toward Goal’
arts.sum: Former Serie A referee Gianpaolo Calvarese backed Daniele Doveri’s decision to caution Yann Bisseck instead of sending him off during Inter Milan’s 2-1 win over Hellas Verona at the Stadio Bentegodi. The incident saw the German defender foul Giovane as the last man. arts.ttl: Hellas Verona 1-2 Inter Milan – Former Serie A Referee Explains Why Bisseck’s Foul Wasn’t Red: ‘Ball Not Headed Towards Goal’
arts.sum: Refereeing analyst Luca Marelli gave his verdict on the main incidents from Inter Milan’s 2-1 win over Hellas Verona, explaining why the Yann Bisseck foul on Giovane was correctly judged without a red card. arts.sum: Manuel Akanji praised Cristian Chivu and his relentless focus on improvement after Inter Milan narrowly won 2-1 against Hellas Verona at the Stadio Bentegodi. Akanji underlined how the Romanian coach continues to push his players to grow regardless of the result. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Head Coach Reveals ‘I Was Against The Corner Routine’ That Led To Zielinski Wonder Goal In Verona Win
arts.sum: Cristian Chivu admitted his team’s 2-1 win over Hellas Verona was “the kind of game that’s easier to lose than to win,” as Inter Milan left it late to take three crucial points at the Stadio Bentegodi. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Star Claims ‘A Bit Of Luck Helps – We Want To Reach The Level We Deserve’ After Starring Role Against Verona

arts.ttl: Inter Milan & Poland Star After Wonder Goal In Verona: ‘You Can’t Score Four Every Game’
arts.sum: Piotr Zielinski was full of praise for Inter Milan’s preparation and mentality after the Nerazzurri ground out a dramatic 2-1 win over Hellas Verona at the Stadio Bentegodi. The Polish midfielder opened the scoring with a spectacular long-range strike before a 90+3rd-minute own goal from Martin Frese secured all three points for Cristian Chivu’s side. arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 1-2 Inter: Zielinski and own goal snatch late victory
arts.sum: Inter scraped a last-gasp victory away to Verona with a sensational Piotr Zielinski set-piece routine...
